sentences: Meie plaanid said segamini viimase hetkel.
See lugu on mul peas segamini.
context: The word 'segamini' in Estonian describes a state of disarray, confusion, or being mixed up. It can refer to physical objects being disorganized or to someone’s thoughts being jumbled. In English, it is similar to saying something is ‘all over the place’ or ‘a mess’.
